examples.korean: We keep our valuables under lock and key. 발음듣기 우리는 귀중품은 안전한 곳에 넣어 잠가 둔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We keep our valuables under lock and key. 발음

examples.korean: The survivors were lifted to safety by helicopter. 발음듣기 생존자들은 헬리콥터로 안전한 곳으로 이송되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The survivors were lifted to safety by helicopter. 발음

examples.korean: They reached safety seconds before the building was engulfed in flames. 발음듣기 그들은 그 건물을 불길이 집어삼키기 몇 초 전에 안전한 곳으로 빠져나왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They reached safety seconds before the building was engulfed in flames. 발음

examples.korean: Survivors of the wreck were plucked to safety by a helicopter. 발음듣기 그 난파 사고의 생존자들은 헬리콥터가 들어올려 안전한 곳으로 옮겼다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Survivors of the wreck were plucked to safety by a helicopter. 발음

examples.korean: the safe disposal of sharps 발음듣기 날카로운 물건들의 안전한 처리 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the safe disposal of sharps 발음
